title: Royal Canin Medium Adult - Dry Food for Medium Dogs
description: Royal Canin Medium Adult is a complete and balanced food for adult dogs of medium size (11-25 kg). It contains all the necessary nutrients to maintain optimal health of your pet. The formulation is specially adapted for medium-sized dogs with specific nutritional needs.

features: Cereals, meat and meat derivatives, vegetable derivatives, oils and fats
Vitamin A: 15500 IU, Vitamin D3: 1000 IU, Iron: 42 mg

title: Whiskas Tuna - Canned Food for Cats
description: Whiskas Tuna is a delicious canned food for cats with tuna in jelly. It contains high-quality proteins from tuna, vitamins and minerals that support your pet's health. Ideal for daily nutrition or as a treat.

features: Meat and meat derivatives (tuna 4%), cereals, minerals
Vitamin D3: 200 IU, Iron: 9.6 mg, Copper: 1 mg

title: Kong Classic - Rubber Chew Toy for Dogs
description: Kong Classic is a classic rubber toy for dogs that provides hours of fun and healthy chewing. Made from natural rubber that is safe for dogs and helps clean teeth. Can be filled with food or treats for extra fun.

title: Bio-Groom Protein Lanolin Shampoo for Dogs
description: Bio-Groom Protein Lanolin Shampoo is a professional shampoo for dogs that deeply cleans and hydrates skin and fur. Contains lanolin that helps maintain natural skin moisture, while proteins strengthen the fur. Suitable for all coat types.

title: Ferplast Comfort Bed - Bed for Medium Dogs
description: Ferplast Comfort Bed is a comfortable bed for medium-sized dogs with a soft cushion and waterproof base. Made from quality materials that are easy to clean. Provides your pet with a comfortable resting space.

title: Vitakraft Menu Vital - Seeds for Parrots
description: Vitakraft Menu Vital is a complete seed mix for parrots containing sunflower seeds, various grains and nuts. Enriched with vitamins and minerals for your parrot's health. Ideal for daily nutrition.

features: Sunflower, millet, oat groats, flax seeds

title: Catit Design Sifting Cat Pan - Litter Box for Cats
description: Catit Design Sifting Cat Pan is a modern litter box for cats with a sifting system. Maintenance is easier because you can separate only the dirty litter and leave the clean one. Made from quality plastic that is scratch resistant.

title: TetraMin - Granular Food for Tropical Fish
description: TetraMin is a high-quality granular food for tropical freshwater fish. Contains all necessary nutrients, vitamins and minerals for healthy growth and fish coloration. Granules sink slowly allowing all fish to eat.

features: Fish and fish derivatives, cereals, plant extracts

title: Cat Laser Pointer - Laser Toy for Cats
description: Cat Laser Pointer is a fun laser toy that will provide your cat with hours of activity. The red laser stimulates the natural hunting instinct in cats. Comes with a safety switch and on/off button.

title: PetSafe Drinkwell Platinum - Automatic Feeder for Dogs
description: PetSafe Drinkwell Platinum is an automatic feeder that can dispense food at programmed times. It has a large food reservoir and can be programmed for multiple meals per day. Ideal for dogs that eat at regular times or when you're not at home.

title: Pedigree Pouch Beef - Canned Food for Dogs
description: Pedigree Pouch Beef is a delicious canned food for dogs with beef meat. Contains high-quality proteins, vitamins and minerals that support your dog's health. Suitable for all breeds and age groups.

features: Meat and meat derivatives, cereals, minerals

title: Andis Steel Comb - Steel Comb for Dogs
description: Andis Steel Comb is a professional steel comb for dogs with fine and sparse teeth. Used for precise brushing and removing knots from fur. It is durable and long-lasting quality.

title: Flexi New Classic - Automatic Leash for Dogs
description: Flexi New Classic is an automatic leash that self-rewinds and gives your dog freedom of movement. It has an ergonomic handle and quick-stop system. Suitable for dogs weighing up to 15 kg.

title: Purina ONE Adult Chicken - Dry Food for Cats
description: Purina ONE Adult Chicken is a complete and balanced dry food for adult cats with chicken flavor. Contains high-quality proteins, omega-3 fatty acids and probiotics for digestive health.

title: Chuckit! Ultra Ball - Hard Ball for Dogs
description: Chuckit! Ultra Ball is an ultra-hard ball made from natural rubber that is resistant to chewing. Designed for long-term use and provides maximum fun for your dog. It bounces well and is easy to throw.

title: Petmate Aspen - Cat Carrier
description: Petmate Aspen is a spacious cat carrier with mesh panels for ventilation and safety locks. It has a soft padded bottom for your pet's comfort. Perfect for travel and veterinary visits.

title: Versele-Laga Prestige - Premium Food for Parrots
description: Versele-Laga Prestige is a premium mix of seeds and pelletized food for parrots. Contains more than 50 ingredients including seeds, nuts and vitamin pellets. Provides complete and balanced nutrition.

title: Beaphar Anti-Parasite Shampoo for Cats
description: Beaphar Anti-Parasite Shampoo is a shampoo against fleas and ticks for cats. Contains natural ingredients such as pyrethrum and neem oil. Effective against external parasites and leaves fur soft and shiny.

features: Apply to wet hair, massage and rinse

title: Ferplast Dog Bowl - Ceramic Dog Feeder
description: Ferplast Dog Bowl is an elegant ceramic dog feeder with anti-slip bottom. Made from high-quality ceramic that is easy to clean and scratch resistant. Available in various sizes and colors.

title: Yeowww! Catnip Toy - Catnip Toy
description: Yeowww! Catnip Toy is a soft toy filled with catnip that stimulates your cat's natural instincts. Made from quality materials and has a rattle inside for additional fun. Perfect for play and training.

title: Vitakraft Hamster Nature - Hamster Food
description: Vitakraft Hamster Nature is a natural mix of seeds and cereals for hamsters. Contains more than 10 types of seeds, cereals and vegetables. Enriched with vitamins and minerals for your hamster's health.

title: Savic Hamster Cage - Hamster Cage
description: Savic Hamster Cage is a spacious hamster cage with multiple levels and plenty of space for play. It has secure locks, feeder and water bottle. Made from quality plastic that is easy to clean.

title: JBL Novo Gold - Food for Goldfish
description: JBL Novo Gold is a special food for goldfish with optimal ratio of proteins and carbohydrates. Contains spirulina for intense color and healthy scales. The food is easily digestible and does not pollute the water.

title: Millers Forge - Nail Clippers for Dogs and Cats
description: Millers Forge clippers are professional clippers for trimming nails of dogs and cats. Has a safety stopper that prevents excessive trimming. Ergonomic handle provides comfortable grip and precise control.

description: Prevue Pet Products Bell is a fun bell for birds that stimulates your pet's natural instincts. Made from safe materials and has a bright color that attracts birds' attention. Perfect for cage enrichment.

title: Tetra AquaArt - 60 Liter Aquarium
description: Tetra AquaArt is a complete 60-liter aquarium with filter, lighting and lid. Made from quality glass and has a modern design. Ideal solution for beginners in aquaristics.

description: Burgess Excel is a complete pelleted food for rabbits that contains all necessary nutrients. Enriched with vitamins, minerals and fiber for digestive health. Helps maintain healthy teeth and good digestion.

title: Pet Head Paw Balm - Paw Balm for Dogs
description: Pet Head Paw Balm is a moisturizing balm for dog paws that protects from salt, ice and other irritants. Contains natural ingredients such as shea butter and beeswax. Absorbs quickly and leaves paws soft and protected.

title: MidWest Cat Scratch Box - Bed with Scratcher for Cats
description: MidWest Cat Scratch Box is a combination bed and scratcher for cats. Has soft lining for sleeping and sisal rope for scratching. Helps maintain your cat's claws and provides comfortable resting space.

description: Savic Hamster Wheel is a silent running wheel for hamsters with safe stopping mechanism. Made from plastic and metal, with non-slip surface. Provides your hamster opportunity for daily exercise.

title: Tetra ReptoMin - Food for Aquatic Turtles
description: Tetra ReptoMin is a complete food for aquatic turtles in the form of floating sticks. Contains high-quality proteins, vitamins and minerals. Helps maintain healthy shell and good health.

description: Exo Terra Terrarium is a fully equipped terrarium for land turtles with lid, substrate and lighting. Made from quality plastic and has ventilation holes. Provides ideal conditions for your pet.

description: Frontline Spray is an effective spray against fleas and ticks for dogs and cats. Contains fipronil that kills parasites and prevents their reappearance. Works for up to 3 months and is safe to use.

description: Savic Rabbit Tunnel is a fun tunnel for rabbits made from quality plastic. Has different entrances and exits which stimulates your rabbit's natural instincts. Easy to clean and can be combined with other toys.

description: Ferplast Drinking Bottle is a practical plastic water bottle for small animals such as hamsters, rabbits and turtles. Has safety mechanism that prevents leaking and is easy to fill. Mounts on cage bars.

description: Vitakraft Mouse Menu is a complete food for mice that contains more than 40 ingredients. Includes seeds, cereals, vegetables and fruits. Enriched with vitamins and minerals for your mice's health.

title: Beaphar Duo Tabs - Vitamins for Dogs
description: Beaphar Duo Tabs are vitamin and mineral supplements for dogs of all sizes. Contain calcium, phosphorus and vitamin D3 for bone and teeth health. Help prevent nutritional deficiencies.

description: Ferplast Bird Cage is a spacious bird cage with multiple levels and plenty of space for flight. Has feeder, water bottle and toys. Made from quality plastic and metal, easy to clean.

title: Beaphar Litter Deodorant - Sand Deodorant

title: Kong Teddy Bear - Plush Toy for Dogs
description: Kong Teddy Bear is a soft plush toy in the shape of a teddy bear filled with fabric pieces. Designed for chewing and throwing, with seams that withstand dog attacks. Helps clean teeth.

description: Halt! Anti-Bark Collar is an electronic collar that helps control excessive barking in dogs. Uses ultrasonic tones and vibrations instead of electric impulses. Easy to adjust and safe to use.

description: Versele-Laga Canary is a specialized seed mix for canaries that contains more than 10 types of seeds and cereals. Enriched with vitamins and minerals for feather health and color. Helps maintain optimal condition.

description: Savic Rabbit Chew Toys are a set of chew toys for rabbits made from natural materials. Help maintain healthy teeth and provide fun. Include different textures for different chewing needs.

description: Savic Mouse Wheel is a silent running wheel for mice with safety stopping mechanism. Made from plastic and has non-slip surface. Provides mice opportunity for daily exercise in cage.

description: Burgess Rabbit Excel is complete food for rabbits that contains pellets, hay and vegetables. Enriched with probiotics for digestive health and vitamins for stronger immune system. Helps maintain optimal weight and health.

description: Gourmet Gold is premium canned food for cats with tuna flavor in jelly. Contains high-quality proteins and omega-3 fatty acids for healthy skin and coat. No artificial colors and flavors.

description: Savic Hamster Igloo is a spacious igloo-shaped house for hamsters that provides privacy and security. Made from quality plastic with ventilation holes. Fits perfectly in cage and helps reduce stress.

description: Savic Bunny Chew Toys are a set of chew toys for rabbits made from natural materials. Help maintain healthy teeth and provide fun. Include different textures for different chewing needs.
